3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clean walls with visible thickness, accurate isometric angle, and consistent ceiling removal.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Excellent room adjacency and wall proportions; most openings align perfectly. Stairs and entrance stairs are accurately translated.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement highly faithful to 2D plan, including kitchen cabinets, bathroom fixtures, and bedroom arrangement.

visual_clarity.notes: High structural clarity with consistent materials; very minor lighting shadows in thin corridors.

detected_errors.description: The window in the Dining area is centered in 3D but offset in 2D.

summary: An exceptional 3D conversion that maintains high geometric fidelity and accurately reproduces all interior elements from the 2D floor plan.
